headline: Amgen Drops 7% After A 'Big Unknown Risk' Rattles Its Monthly Obesity Shot
summary: Amgen stock tumbled late Tuesday on a report its high-profile weight-loss shot, MariTide, could be linked to bone mineral density loss.

raw.headline: Amgen Drops 7% After A 'Big Unknown Risk' Rattles Its Monthly Obesity Shot
raw.summary: Amgen stock tumbled late Tuesday on a report its high-profile weight-loss shot, MariTide, could be linked to bone mineral density loss.

headline: Recode Ventures, in Partnership with Lilly, Launches Recode Edge, a Multi-Million Dollar Program to Enable AI-Powered Healthcare Innovations
summary: Recode Ventures is excited to announce Eli Lilly and Company as the Founding Partner of Recode Edge, a groundbreaking multi-million dollar investment program for early-stage AI-first healthcare...

headline: Pfizer and Lilly’s telehealth prescribing platforms draw Senate scrutiny for ‘potential fraud’
summary: As Big Pharma embraces telehealth to sell medicines directly to patients, lawmakers wonder whether the programs skirt anti-kickback rules.

raw.headline: Pfizer and Lilly’s telehealth prescribing platforms draw Senate scrutiny for ‘potential fraud’
